backend/main.mo: Implements user profile storage with access control, allowing users to view and save their own profiles and admins to view any profile.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence reports mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test cases.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists prewritten summaries for various frontend files in JSON form.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app logic handling identity initialization, routing between dashboard and backend tester, and profile setup flow.
Dialog for adding cryptocurrencies that currently displays a notice that backend crypto support is not implemented.
frontend/src/components/BackendTesterEnt: Button component that checks admin status and navigates to the Backend Tester in full or limited mode with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/ConfigErrorBound: Empty placeholder component intended for configuration-related error handling.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionBootst: Manages backend actor initialization with timeout, error handling, re-authentication, and retry UI around connection state.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionDetail: Expandable card showing connection diagnostics and a copyable debug summary.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionRecove: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/CryptoCard.tsx: Displays mock crypto market data with price, market cap, and opens a detail dialog.
frontend/src/components/CryptoDetailDial: Dialog showing forecast chart and settings for a selected crypto symbol.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Static footer with attribution and a disclaimer about crypto risks.
frontend/src/components/ForecastChart.ts: Generates mock historical data, computes regression and moving averages, and renders a forecast chart.
frontend/src/components/ForecastSettings: Panel for adjusting moving average period and forecast horizon via sliders.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling theme toggle, authentication, user registration, and tester navigation.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Displays a login prompt highlighting app features and triggers Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal allowing users to submit their name and save their profile using backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/SimulatedBashPan: Interactive terminal-like panel for executing backend commands with reconnection logic, admin checks, and real-time output handling.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistManager: UI for managing a watchlist, currently showing demo-mode notice due to missing backend features.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistPriceTi: Displays live price tick section but shows demo-mode alert since backend support is not implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorEnhanced.ts: Wraps useActor with diagnostics, timeout handling, and retry flows for improved backend connection resilience.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, state tracking, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, admin checks, and placeholder crypto functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables plus base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/BackendTesterPage.tsx: UI page displaying admin diagnostics, identity info, and backend test utilities with access gating.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard showing watchlist, price ticks, and popular crypto cards with optional tester navigation.
frontend/src/utils/backendTesterCommands: Defines demo backend command configurations for market, symbol, registration, and admin operations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app purpose, issues with tester scrolling and demo/live mode messaging, and associated feature requests.
